import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FaFacebook, FaTwitter, FaInstagram, FaLinkedin, FaEnvelope, FaPhone, FaMapMarkerAlt } from 'react-icons/fa'; import api from '../config/axios'; const Footer = () => { const currentYear = new Date().getFullYear(); const footerLinks = { boutique: [ { name: 'À propos', link: '/about' }, { name: 'Nos valeurs', link: '/values' }, { name: 'Carrières', link: '/careers' }, { name: 'Presse', link: '/press' } ], aide: [ { name: 'Centre d\'aide', link: '/help' }, { name: 'Livraison', link: '/shipping' }, { name: 'Retours', link: '/returns' }, { name: 'Taille', link: '/size-guide' } ], legal: [ { name: 'Conditions générales', link: '/terms' }, { name: 'Politique de confidentialité', link: '/privacy' }, { name: 'Cookies', link: '/cookies' }, { name: 'Mentions légales', link: '/legal' } ] }; const socialLinks = [ { icon: , link: 'https://facebook.com', label: 'Facebook' }, { icon: , link: 'https://twitter.com', label: 'Twitter' }, { icon: , link: 'https://instagram.com', label: 'Instagram' }, { icon: , link: 'https://linkedin.com', label: 'LinkedIn' } ]; return (
